title: Franchise value of the Los Angeles Clippers ( NBA ) 2003 to 2020
yAxis: Franchise value in million U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Franchise value in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2003 to 2004, slightly increasing from 2004 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2011, and finally slightly increasing from 2011 to 2013.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
The highest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, of value 430.0 was reached at Year 2013
Minimum Franchise value in million U.S. dollars about 205.0 was reached at Year 2003
min_summary: In general Franchise value in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
